channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Snowflake shares rocket 30% and head for best day ever after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as Post-Election Selloff Tempts In New Buyers
item.description: Gold futures rise as the heavy selloff post-U.S. election shifts into reverse.

item.title: Bitcoin Hits Fresh Record High, Could Soon Reach $100K

item.title: Palo Alto Networks beat and raise fails to wow Wall Street. But that plays into our hand
item.description: Don't sweat the drop in Palo Alto Networks stock.

item.title: Target shares plunge 21% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years

item.title: Oil Extends Gains on Russia-Ukraine War Escalation Fears
item.description: Oil extended gains in European afternoon trade, based on growing fears of an escalation in the war between Russia and Ukraine.

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
